page.title: 08BUCKLAND COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: The{Community Centre}was built in{1974 for the people of the{Buckland area.} There are many activities at the centre. There are weekly meetings for the{Akido class,}the{mentally {handicapped, playgroup, bingo, toddler {group, disabled, majorettes,}and{keep {fit.}There is a monthly meeting for the{Wine Circle}and the centre can be hired for{birthday parties}etc. On Saturdays during the winter the{ {Buckland Football Club}use the centre. {French students}use it during the summer. It is run by a committee who are all{volunteers}and are unpaid.{337 people attend the centre during any one month. It is owned by{Teignbridge {Council}and a{Â£1 lease}is paid each{ {year.}
